itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Racial trauma hits different. It goes deep, affects our bodies, and our peace.  In this episode, I talk about how it's been affecting me, and some resources I have found.      FREE DOWNLOAD  CONNECT WITH US...
